nodes.title: Update 1.2 for Yupitergrad is out now!

node.reviewDescription:
Omg. I am blown away by this game. It has the most unique visuals of any game and it’s basically Spider-Man VR and red matter mushed together and then a time trial type game mode that is just awesome and adds loads of replayibility. And only 15 dollars.

I honestly feel sorry for people who bought richies plank experience for the same price instead of this absolute gaming masterpiece. At least through my eyes. 

Devs, I hope that people will remember this game because I love it 

I look forward to going back to yupitergrad later tonight.
node.reviewTitle: Omg I’m so glad this is a thing

website_page_meta.description: Yupitergrad is the plunger-driven kosmonaut game where you can swing through space station with style all in cell-shaded graphics. Can you believe that grappling hooks is the definitive way of locomotion in place like this? It's one of a kind experience, where VR platformer meets puzzles in a single player campaign. It also gives you arcade thrills with Time Attack mode. All of this is soaked in delicious dieselpunk sauce.
website_page_meta.title: Yupitergrad · Oculus Quest
